title:
I have a problem with a local car dealer Savvy Wheels who promised me over a year ago to program my key and fix passenger seat.  I want to know how I can put in a complaint or speak to a reporter.  This man, Joe the owner, has lied to me repeatedly even though I have continued to call him the entire time.  Please let me know wht I can do.

Thank you so much

Toni Titone
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2014/04/how-do-i-put-in-a-complaint-against-an-auto-repair-shop-that-didnt-do-the-work/
